s_synopsis: "Rail Chase" is a first person perspective rail shooter where you play the role of an explorer and assistant who has discovered the Jewels of Guaramure and is now trying to escape with them from the locals. Your means of escape is a mine-cart and as you ride along you must use your gun to help you in your escape over various stages as you are being chased by a stage boss. There are various enemies and obstacles that must be shot so not to damage the mine-cart which slowly starts to show the damage you are taking. There are enemies on the side of the tracks, in mine-carts and on various other vehicles.
